columns.Conductor_ID: The unique identifier for each conductor.
columns.Name: The full name of the conductor.
columns.Age: The age of the conductor in years.
columns.Nationality: The country of origin of the conductor.
columns.Year_of_Work: The total years the conductor has worked.

conductor.table_description: The table stores information about conductors in the orchestra.

columns.Orchestra_ID: The unique identifier for each orchestra.
columns.Conductor_ID: The unique identifier for the associated conductor.
columns.Record_Company: The name of the record company producing the orchestra's recordings.
columns.Year_of_Founded: The year the orchestra was established.
columns.Major_Record_Format: The primary format used for the orchestra's recordings.

orchestra.table_description: The table stores information about orchestras and their details.

columns.Performance_ID: The unique identifier for each performance.
columns.Orchestra_ID: The unique identifier for the associated orchestra.
columns.Type: The category of the performance event.
columns.Date: The date when the performance took place.
columns.Official_ratings_(millions): The audience ratings in millions for the performance.
columns.Weekly_rank: The ranking of the performance in the weekly charts.
columns.Share: The percentage share of the performance's audience.

performance.table_description: The table stores details about various performances of orchestras.

columns.Show_ID: The unique identifier for each show.
columns.Performance_ID: The unique identifier for the associated performance.
columns.If_first_show: The indicator of whether this is the first show.
columns.Result: The outcome of the show indicated by a character.
columns.Attendance: The number of attendees at the show.

show.table_description: The table stores details about shows associated with performances.
